name: Space Opera (Cheesy Studio)
description:
The earth  wifi  mega rooter has been stolen by aliens! Be a hero and keep connection between Earth and the rooter so that peoples still can watch cute cat videos!

Try to stay as close as possible to the anthena to increase your score and use your upgrades to push futher, manage your fuel supply but beware deadly asteroids!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A game done for the "Opera GX Game Jam" in about 10 days

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cheesy Studio
